title: MMR

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi league community,
Recently got into playing ranked and I LOVE it :)
My one concern is MMR and how fast it decreases.
If you look at the link on op.gg The last RANKED leona game I played my mmr was at 1,422 (something around there) 
The next 4 games in norms took my MMR down to 1,196. (wasn't playing srsly just having fun) 
My question is will my MMR being tanked down in norms effect my MMR when I play ranked?

replies.body:
MMR is calculated based off of the difference of MMR your opponents have. If you were versing opponents with MMR of around 1,200 and you *lose* to them, your MMR will very easily go down to their levels.

It's just chance and coincidence, really.
